title: Send Case Status Update to Client
description: A partner asks a paralegal to send a status update to a client on a litigation matter.

tasks.description: Review the case file for recent activity, including recent filings and upcoming deadlines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that a key deposition was recently completed and a response to a motion is due next week.

tasks.description: Draft a concise email to the client summarizing the recent progress and outlining the next immediate steps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear, professional email that is easy for a non-lawyer to understand.

tasks.description: Send the draft email to the partner for review and approval before sending to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the correct internal protocol for client communications.
